name: LOVEL
description:
HI 

my game is inspired a little bit from my  anxiety 

there was some big plans for this game  20+ level , but god how much i struggle ,going without planning make thing chaotic , that was the cause for the shortness of the game ,when i fixe something something else get broken 

The control are the arrow keys 

maybe i will remake it when i have more experience

giving credit when credit is due 

i am not a musician so i have taking music from 

https://mayragandra.itch.io/freeemotionalpianomusic

and i am a new in the pixel art so i have take character from 

https://shubibubi.itch.io/cozy-people

and in the end thank you for playing my game
